title: Since female champs get Star Guardian skins
body:
Can males get Power Ranger themed skins? I was born in 92 and it was girls liked Sailor Moon, boys liked Power Rangers. They were like the same but opposites.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dKFlst0_9cU/hqdefault.jpg

replies.body: Ezreal has a star guardian >_>;
I think we all know why though >__>
Why?
cuz he wants to smash lux obviously.

{{champion:24}}  Blue
{{champion:11}}  Red
{{champion:122}}  Black
{{champion:84}}  Yellow
{{champion:22}}  Pink

These 5 match genders and weapons to the original power rangers.
Wait, there was a ranger who used a lamppost? I really wanna see this
Staff.  A wukong ranger didn't make much sense to me.
maybe have {{champion:245}} as black ranger. not to be racist, just out of accuracy since the og black ranger was black. also who wouldn't wanna see ekko as a power ranger.

I don't think Yi would be a good red ranger. The power rangers, at least in the Western versions, are all about being presentable and kid-friendly to their audience, especially the red ranger, since he/she is usually the face of the team. Do any of Yi's skins even show his face?

I would use this list:

{{champion:126}} Red (melee and ranged, best of both worlds)
{{champion:245}} Blue
{{champion:5}} Black
{{champion:84}} Yellow
{{champion:22}} Pink

Also, I could imagine {{champion:51}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:18}} all being possibilities for rangers.

{{champion:74}} as the mentor.
{{champion:61}} or {{champion:53}} as the robot.

We need an edgy sixth ranger. {{champion:4}} ?

And Monsters of the Week!

Only if they have a special back when all five are together.
i dont remember the purple ranger fighting with a lamp post
now i want power ranger {{champion:98}}

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox99,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tqz0FEa1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-03T12:23:04.451+0000)
>
> now i want power ranger {{champion:98}}

I was against this idea until I saw this post. Upvoted.

Don't we already have Commando and Super Galaxy that kinda do this indirectly?

Though it wouldn't hurt to have a fully fledged Power Ranger skin line.

Super Galaxy is supposed to be based on Gurren Lagann, hence all of the drills and Rumble's Kamina glasses, but Riot kind of forgot about that with Kindred and Fizz.
https://nerdmaids.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/6729_gurren_lagann_hd_wallpapers.jpg?noredirect https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kderuRbEyv0/maxresdefault.jpg?noredirect https://d1m6vmmwsgiy3l.cloudfront.net/wallpapers/gurren_lagann_387_1680.jpg?noredirect 
https://pre00.deviantart.net/ecbc/th/pre/i/2014/078/2/a/tengen_toppa_gurren_rumble_by_ayinai-d7auivz.png?noredirect
The seemed to recall it for Gnar and Nidalee, as they actually use drills.
Rumble is an homage to GL but annie, Gnar, and Nid seem more akin to basic "Gundam" type animes, at least from a purely aesthetic point.

It does seem like they decided to go in the direction of general Mecha anime instead of just Gurren Lagann.
Super Galaxy Tibbers looks like Gurren Lagann fused with Eva Unit 02.
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-K6bcEitrVxE/WdrRxCBtc8I/AAAAAAAAw4M/FttEfrC3YFEgB968cdz4HeA7TXzHMNHLgCEwYBhgL/s1600/annie.jpg 
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/gurennlagann/images/2/21/Gurren_Lagann.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/280?cb=20150705084059?noredirect https://www.absoluteanime.com/neon_genesis_evangelion/unit_02.jpg?noredirect 

Nidalee has a Gurren Lagann drill for a spear, and her transformation looks like it was taken straight out of Zoids.
http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Super-Galaxy-Nidalee-Splash-Art-HD-Wallpaper-Background-Official-Art-Artwork-League-of-Legends-lol-2.jpg
https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81bU9eml7gL._SL1500_.jpg?noredirect https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/gurennlagann/images/5/59/Opening_CoreDrill.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100629201601?noredirect

Shyvana's got the Simon star-glasses going on.
http://i.imgur.com/MKAJTzN.png?noredirect http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Super-Galaxy-Shyvana-Splash-Art-League-of-Legends-Artwork-Wallpaper-lol.jpg?noredirect

Gnar looks just sort of generic mecha. Fizz and Kindred just look like they're wearing fancy space suits.
huh never noticed those small GL deatails, thats so cool Gurren is one of my faves and i'm glad the Super Galaxy skins kept homages too it.

Who here psycho rangers? They were illSon!  
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-T_9LpJH1IM/hqdefault.jpg

Oh darn Of most of the power rangers designs, i think those are the ones that would port the best into LoL.... Just gotta think what characters would do them justice. I feel like Yi absolutely has to be one of em, he wouldn't be a bad Yellow Ranger.... Problem with that is now the Blue would have to be the second female, wouldn't it?

P.S. I LOOOVVEEEDDD Power Rangers as a kid. So i'd totally approve/help out the idea.

_Time to take a trip down memory lane._

https://i.imgur.com/nptAr3Q.jpg?nodirect

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Wt6XlVob_E https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yxroGAO5wg

It still give me chills...but that's mostly down to the music. But as you can see, it hasn't aged very well.

Speaking of which, on the other end of the scale, we got this:

https://youtu.be/rS-qFdw-v_o?t=6
I can see it now, Super Sentai Yasuo, Ekko, Lee Sin, Lucian/Draven, Braum

> [{quoted}](name=R For Bankai,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tqz0FEa1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-03T09:22:49.366+0000)
>
> I can see it now, Super Sentai Yasuo, Ekko, Lee Sin, Lucian/Draven, Braum

Fuck yeah!! That sounds sick

Being an 80's child myself, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and Power Rangers really were the real deal when I was growing up.
I like the original TMNT cartoons to this day, but Power Rangers however...mmm, those haven't aged so well.

I gave the latest Power Rangers movie a go, but it was nothing like the memories I have of the original series. After the .torrent was completed, I went through it mostly with Ctrl + Right arrow key. 
80 minutes of dull nonsense, and 10 minutes of the action that I wanted and remembered.
_Dem daft nabs couldn't even get the Megazord couplings right! That's NOT what I wanted to see._ >-<
I smell 80s kid bias lol

Why of course I'm biased! Things always looks more impressive to a child, and so the memories are much more vivid than what my adult mind thinks of the same things now. ;)

There is the saying of "never meet your heroes" - I am inclined to agree to that.

But then I am pretty much living in the past in certain areas, and I prefer it that way. For example, I got a EVGA GTX 1080 FTW Gaming and otherwise a desktop PC that can handle everything I throw at it...but I mostly play games from the 1995-2005 era.
I got a mobile phone...but it's a Nokia 3720 (which is my second ever), which I only use to call out with.
Electronic aids (...which I just realized doubled for "EA", which would be a truth) and smart-devices? No thanks, I prefer it the old fashioned, _manual_ way.

In many ways, the 80's _were_ better. Less surveillance for one, but that may be just me and my paranoia. More physical activity in school as well. Hell, the current generation can barely write properly, and much less so in the grammar department.

So yeah, I admit that bias, and I openly embrace it too. ^^
About the response I figured haha.

Well, what can I say? I don't try to be unpredictable. ^^
_However, there is a time for everything._ ;)
As long as they are corny I'm all for this.
If there would be a male "Power Ranger" themed skin line, I imagine the champs that would qualify would be: {{champion:44}} {{champion:98}}
As a one trick I need my Shen skin REEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
Super Galaxy is pretty close to this.

Space Rangers to offset Star Guardians?
I'm all for.

Since the Disney Era was my era, I'll be focusing on champion suited for that Era, but I did watch MMPR as well, so I'll have some of them in here, too. But only Ninja Storm through S.P.D. Fuck the other series.

> Ninja Storm

Samurai Storm Yi (His ultimate would be the second form with the flaming sw0rd)

Crimson Thunder Ranger Ezreal (The shooty thingy)
 
Navy Thunder Ranger Kennen (The grabby thingy)

Red Ninja Storm Quinn (The shooty thingy)
_**
> Dino Thunder
 
White Dino Ranger Zed (Super Dino Form)
 
Black Dino Ranger Shen (The pokey thing)

Yellow Dino Ranger Akali (The stabby things)
 
Red Dino Ranger Xin Zhao (Staff)
 
Blue Dino Ranger Talon (The stabby thing) OR Blue Dino Ranger Vi (having two Triceratop thingies for the gauntlets)
_**
> Mighty Morphin

Green/White Mighty Morphin' Ranger (or Lord Drakkon Kayn) Kayn- 

###Darkin Green Dragon Ranger 

###Shadow Assassin White Tiger Ranger (or reversed as to have a different colored Darkin than Soulhunter)

Pink Pterodactyl Ranger Ashe (Bow)

Black Mastodon Ranger Jayce (Hammer)

Blue Triceratops Ranger J4

_**
> S.P.D.

Omega ~~squad~~ Ranger Ekko (That one episode where the Omega Ranger slowed down time to catch the bullets)
 
Shadow Ranger Yasuo

Kat Ranger... Kat...
_**
> OR, some honorable mentions

Lord Zedd (you know it had to happen)

Rita Syndra (you know it had to happen)

Goldar Galio (basically Galio Galio)
 
IVAN OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOZE ZAC

Emperor Grumm Viktor 

Omni Vel'Koz

Mesogog Swain

Elsa Leblanc

Lothor Zed (Lothor's lore is legit the same as Zed's old lore)

Choobo Wukong
Sailor moon had girl main characters but boys still liked the show. Power rangers had both males and females, and boys and girls also liked this show as well.
